title: Silver IV looking for duo/team
body: Hey I'm Silver IV about to drop down to Silver V, looking for a team or duo to play ranked with as I think solo queue has given me enough cancerous tumours to feed an entire african tribe. I main mid but I usually just play support in ranked as it's more fun especially if I'm premade with the ADC. Feel free to play some norms with me or something to see if I am up to your standard but be honest if I'm trash thanks hmu no homo

replies.body:
Jungle main, Can Support or mid 
ign - Phraser
B3

hey man. i know those feels... keen for a few games when you are.

gamer tag: span
